page.title: 03Our School.
page.content: Our school is in High St. in the centre of the village. It is a friendly school where everybody knows everyone else. 73 children attend the school although Mr. George remembers the time when there were over 200 pupils. Mr. George is our Headmaster and teaches the Junior Class in the morning whilst Mrs. Phillips teaches the class each afternoon. Mrs. Tatchell teaches the Transition Class and Mrs. McCann the Infants Class. Each morning we have Maths, English and Welsh and in the afternoon we do Project Work ,which includes History, Geography and Science. We also study Art/Craft, Music, R.E. etc. Mr. George retires this term after teaching here for 35 years. We will be sorry to see him leave. Mrs. Tatchell will be our new Head Teacher.(Gr.D)N.p
